SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Level2

Class LevelViewLevelTwo

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.LevelView
com.example.demo.Level2.LevelViewLevelTwo
public class LevelViewLevelTwo extends LevelView
The LevelView for Level 2 of the game. This class extends LevelView and is responsible for displaying elements specific to Level 2, including the shield image for the boss.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelViewLevelTwo

      public LevelViewLevelTwo(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay)
      Constructs a new LevelViewLevelTwo instance. Initializes the root group and the shield image to be displayed in this level.
      Parameters:
      root - The root group where visual elements will be added.
      heartsToDisplay - The number of hearts to be displayed for the player's health.

  • Method Details

    • addImagesToRoot

      private void addImagesToRoot()
      Adds the shield image to the root of the level. This method ensures the shield is added to the scene if it hasn't been added already.

    • showShield

      public void showShield(double xPosition, double yPosition)
      Shows the shield at the specified position. The shield is placed at the given coordinates and made visible.
      Parameters:
      xPosition - The X coordinate where the shield should be placed.
      yPosition - The Y coordinate where the shield should be placed.

    • hideShield

      public void hideShield()
      Hides the shield from the view. This method is used to deactivate the shield and remove it from view.

    • updateShieldPosition

      public void updateShieldPosition(double x, double y)
      Updates the position of the shield. This method moves the shield to the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The new X coordinate for the shield's position.
      y - The new Y coordinate for the shield's position.
